mapper.select: select id, post_num, post_title, post_content, thumbnail, to_char(input_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') input_date from (select post.id, post.post_num, post_title, post_content, thumbnail, like_post.input_date, row_number() over(order by like_post.input_date desc) rnum from like_post, post where post.post_num=like_post.post_num and like_post.id=#{ column_value }) where rnum between #{ start_num } and #{ end_num }
